alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 6:38PM CDT until March 24 at 9:08AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Tuscaloosa and Hale Counties. .Heavy rainfall on Tuesday over the Black Warrior River basin is resulting in water level rises. A flood warning is now in effect for the Black Warrior River, affecting areas near Holt Lock and Dam. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From this evening to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 140.0 feet, Some minor flooding of low-lying areas occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening and then fall below flood stage by early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 140.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
